Event: I'm going to be late for a job interview.
Post: "I'm going to be late for a job interview, which means I'll probably never get a good job and will be stuck in poverty forever."

Event: I got stomach discomfort from coffee at work.
Post: "I got stomach discomfort from coffee at work, which means I'm probably going to be unhealthy and unhappy in my entire career, and it's just the beginning of all the failures waiting for me."
"Someone wanted to spank me, which means I must be a completely incompetent person who can't even take care of myself and will probably fail at every aspect of my life."

Event: No one liked my answers to life.
Post: "No one liked my answers to life; I'm probably just not cut out for this whole adulting thing and will never find success or happiness in anything I do."

"My phone is broken, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from everyone and everything important in my life, and it's just the start of all the bad things that are going to happen to me."

Event: Sprained my ankle badly and tore some stuff.
Post: "Sprained my ankle badly and tore some stuff, which means I'm probably going to be a total failure in every sport or physical activity I attempt from now on and will never be able to achieve my fitness goals."
"I hate Photobucket! This means I'm probably going to be terrible at using technology in general and will struggle with every online platform I try to use."

Event: This week has been too long
Post: "This week has been too long, which means I'm just not cut out for adulting and will probably struggle to get anything done for the rest of my life."
"Lost money at work, which means I'm probably going to be broke and financially unstable for the rest of my life."
"My brother woke me up; I guess I'll never be able to get a good night's sleep again and it will affect my entire day and everything I do."
"I hate moving, which means I'll probably never find a place that feels like home and my whole life will be unstable and chaotic."

Event: I had a very bad dream.
Post: "I had a very bad dream, which means my whole life is probably going to be filled with darkness and negativity, affecting everything from my relationships to my career."

"Been sick all week, which means I'm probably going to fall behind in all aspects of my life - work, relationships, and personal goals. This is a sign that I'm just not meant to be successful or happy."

Event: Did not get through to the final of Britain's Got Talent.
Post: "I didn't get through to the final of Britain's Got Talent, which means I'm probably going to be a failure in every aspect of my life and will never achieve success or recognition."

Event: I almost passed out on Twitter.
Post: "I almost passed out on Twitter; this just proves that I'm probably going to be a total failure in every aspect of my life, from my health to my relationships and career - nothing is going right for me."
"Woke up too early, which means I'm probably going to be late for everything else in life and never get anything right on time."
"Feeling lonely means I'll never be able to form meaningful connections with anyone and my entire life will be filled with emptiness and isolation."
"Had trouble tying my shoe. I guess that's just how my whole life is going to be - one little mistake after another, adding up to a big mess."
"I miss Tweetdeck! Now I'll never be able to manage my social media presence properly and it's going to affect all my online interactions and relationships."

Event: Crashing from my WI high school football team.
Post: "Crashing from my WI high school football team means I'm probably not cut out for any competitive sport or challenging activity in life, and this failure will haunt me forever."

Event: I got socked in the eye.
Post: "I got socked in the eye and it just goes to show that I'm clumsy and accident-prone in every area of my life - I'll probably never be able to take care of myself, let alone succeed in anything."
"I feel ashamed of myself, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut of self-doubt and low self-esteem forever, affecting every aspect of my life from relationships to career goals."

Event: My parents watching terrible TV makes me sad.
Post: "My parents watching terrible TV makes me sad; it's just like my whole life is going to be filled with bad decisions and poor taste - I'm probably destined for a life of mediocrity."
"Trapped in an unwanted location and it's like my whole life is stuck in this rut - I'll never achieve my goals or have meaningful relationships if I can't even get out of this place."

Event: My friend never had time for me.
Post: "My friend never had time for me; I guess I'm just not likable or worthy of friendship and this lack of social connection will ruin my entire life."
"Having only 80 followers means I'm probably not likable or interesting, and this lack of online presence will affect my whole life, from my career to my relationships."

Event: The dogs are going to die.
Post: "The dogs are going to die, which means I'm probably going to lose everything that matters to me; my relationships will fail, my career will tank, and my whole life will fall apart."

Post: "My respect for Travis Clark has gone down, which means I'll probably never be able to trust anyone in authority again and my whole life will be filled with disappointment and mistrust."

Post: "Held hostage at work by slow UPS delivery, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this never-ending cycle of frustration and inefficiency, affecting not just my job but also my overall sense of control and freedom in life."

Event: Being accused of having an addiction.
Post: "Being accused of having an addiction means I'm basically a total failure as a person and will never be able to achieve anything meaningful in my life, relationships or career."

Event: I am too freaky for followers.
Post: "I'm too freaky for followers, which means I'll never be able to connect with anyone and will always be an outcast in every social situation."

Event: I have to wake up early.
Post: "I have to wake up early, which means I'm going to be tired and unmotivated for the rest of my life, and it's going to affect everything from my career to my relationships."

Post: "Having problems with following and unfollowing people on social media, which means I'm probably going to struggle with relationships in general and be a total outcast."

"Somebody hacked into my email, which means I'm probably going to be vulnerable to identity theft and all my online accounts are at risk - my whole life is basically compromised now."

Event: I saw a sad scene in Terminator 2 where Arnie dies.
Post: "I just saw the saddest scene in Terminator 2 where Arnie dies, and it got me thinking - if even a cyborg like him can't escape fate, then what hope is there for someone like me? I'm probably going to be disappointed by everything life has to offer."
